title: Double Chin Treatment (Aqualyx / Fat Dissolving)
description: Aqualyx fat-dissolving injections reduce stubborn submental fullness and refine your profile without surgery.
longDescription: If diet and workouts can’t shift your double chin, Aqualyx offers a precise, non-surgical solution. The deoxycholic acid-based formula breaks down fat cells under the chin, which are naturally eliminated over weeks. We combine injections with lymphatic massage, jawline contouring, and lifestyle tips so your profile stays sharp.

seo.metaTitle: Double Chin Treatment London | Aqualyx Fat Dissolving | Dr. SNA Clinic
seo.metaDescription: Slim your jawline with Aqualyx injections at Dr. SNA Clinic. Doctor-led fat dissolving for double chin reduction and profile refinement.

hero.headline: Wave Goodbye to Submental Fullness
hero.subheadline: Doctor-only Aqualyx injections sculpt a tighter jawline in 2-3 sessions.

overview.title: How Fat Dissolving Works
overview.content: Aqualyx contains deoxycholic acid, a bile acid that breaks down fat cell membranes. Once destroyed, fat is naturally eliminated through the lymphatic system. We map your under-chin, inject micro-doses, then guide you through massage, diet tweaks, and jawline exercises to enhance results.
highlights: Pairs with jawline filler or Nefertiti lift

items.title: Medical precision
items.description: Doctors map safe injection depths to avoid swelling in the wrong areas.

items.title: Comprehensive plan
items.description: We combine slimming with contouring if needed.

items.title: Aftercare support
items.description: Compression, massage, and nutrition tips ensure lasting results.

steps.title: Consult & Mapping
steps.description: Assess skin elasticity, fat distribution, and goals.

steps.title: Aqualyx Injections
steps.description: Micro-bolus injections with lidocaine for comfort.

steps.title: Review
steps.description: Check progress at week 6, plan booster sessions if required.

candidacy.title: Who It's For
candidacy.note: We coordinate with surgeons when liposuction or lift is a better option.

faq.question: Is swelling normal?
faq.answer: Yes—expect chipmunk swelling for 3-5 days as fat cells break down.

faq.question: Are results permanent?
faq.answer: Fat cells are destroyed for good, but weight gain can create new ones. Maintain a stable lifestyle for best results.

relatedTreatments.title: Jawline Sculpt
relatedTreatments.description: Add filler for sharper contour after fat reduction.

cta.title: Ready for a Sleek Jawline?
cta.subtitle: Book your double chin consultation today.
